query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZFST0305 ( MANDT ,OCNT_NUMB ,RFCT_SEQN ,VBELN ,PSPID ,AUART ,PS_PSP_PNR ,ORDR_TYPE ,BSTNK ,KUNNR ,KUNWE ,VKORG ,VTWEG ,SPART ,VKGRP ,VKBUR ,VPRGR ,BSTDK ,VDATU ,AUGRU ,LIFSK ,WAERK ,NETWR ,AUTLF ,RPLNR ,FPART ,BEDAT ,BEDAR ,RFPLN ,SLCS_RATE ,DLIV_DATE ,OCNT_APDT ,CONT_DATE ,CMPL_DATE ,OCNT_STAT ,WRIT_DATE ,WRIT_TIME ,WRIT_USER ) SELECT MANDT ,OCNT_NUMB ,CAST(#RFCT_SEQN# AS INTEGER) AS RFCT_SEQN ,VBELN ,PSPID ,AUART ,PS_PSP_PNR ,ORDR_TYPE ,BSTNK ,KUNNR ,KUNWE ,VKORG ,VTWEG ,SPART ,VKGRP ,VKBUR ,VPRGR ,BSTDK ,VDATU ,AUGRU ,LIFSK ,WAERK ,NETWR ,AUTLF ,RPLNR ,FPART ,BEDAT ,BEDAR ,RFPLN ,SLCS_RATE ,DLIV_DATE ,OCNT_APDT ,CONT_DATE ,CMPL_DATE ,OCNT_STAT ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS WRIT_DATE ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS WRIT_TIME ,#G_USER_ID# AS WRIT_USER FROM SAPHEE.ZFST0304 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND OCNT_NUMB = #OCNT_NUMB#
